title: What Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin say about each other
content: This video can not be playedDonald Trump has again heaped praise on Russian President Vladimir Putin, saying he has "been a leader far more" than Barack Obama.It is not the first time Mr Trump has had warm words for the Russian leader - and Mr Putin has in the past been complimentary about the Republican too.Geopolitical bromance or fleeting one-way crush? <http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-37307009>
